metadata.title: DPM Dar greets Egyptian Foreign Minister

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 07 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister, Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Saturday spoke with the Foreign Minister of Egypt, Badr Abdelatty. During conversation, they exchanged greetings on the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha and prayed for peace, prosperity and welfare of the Muslims across the world, particularly in Gaza.
